summary:
Made a simple tes5edit patch, seems to work ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
Ordinator overwrites all perks and magic effects, from what I saw this is mostly bad for the perks of invested because they don't exist now... However the spells still work invested normally!
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][center]﻿WELCOME TO THIS MOD! -> Invested magic ordinated[/center][/size][center]Invested magic- A Better Magic Paradigm:  https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11397
Ordinator - Perks of Skyrim:  https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68425/[/center]
 
Made a simple tes5edit patch, seems to work     ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
Ordinator overwrites all perks and magic effects from invested, from what I saw this is mostly bad for the perks of invested because they don't exist now... However the spells still work normally and by normally I mean like an investment! I think?

Please let me know how bad this may or may not be for your skyrim game and I will try my best to fix it :D
In all honesty I don't think this will crash anything but there may be undesired effects, still testing this!
author: Hopelessdecoy
